revised_title: The Effect of Age and Oestrone Injection on Plumage Response in Brown Leghorn Capons
tldr: This study investigates the effect of age and oestrone injection on the plumage response in Brown Leghorn capons. The researchers found that younger birds had a wider range of responses to oestrone injections, while mature birds showed a more consistent reaction. The study highlights the importance of considering individual factors, such as age, when interpreting the results of oestrone-induced plumage changes in capons.
